lyrics.text: Lesson 83. Ask the elections. First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 第83课。询问选举情况。首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Why did Patrick keep on asking the same question? The former Prime Minister, Mr. Wentworth Lane,
lyrics.translation: 为什么帕特里克一直在问同一个问题？前首相，温特沃斯·莱恩先生，

lyrics.text: was defeated in the recent elections. He is now retiring from political life and has gone abroad.
lyrics.translation: 在最近的选举中失败了。他现在正从政治生活中退休，并已经出国了。

lyrics.text: My friend Patrick has always been a fanatical opponent of Mr. Lane's radical progressive party.
lyrics.translation: 我的朋友帕特里克一直都是莱恩先生的激进进步党的狂热反对者。

lyrics.text: After the elections, Patrick went to the former Prime Minister's house. When he asked if Mr.
lyrics.translation: 选举结束后，帕特里克去了前首相的家。当他问及先生

lyrics.text: Lane lived there, the policeman on duty told him that since his defeat, the ex-Prime Minister had
lyrics.translation: Lane住在那里，值班的警察告诉他，自从他失败后，前首相就

lyrics.text: gone abroad. On the following day, Patrick went to the house again. The same policeman was just
lyrics.translation: 出国了。第二天，帕特里克又去了那所房子。同一个警察刚刚

lyrics.text: walking slowly past the entrance when Patrick asked the same question. Though a little suspicious
lyrics.translation: 当帕特里克提出同样的问题时，我慢慢地走过入口，虽然有点怀疑

lyrics.text: this time, the policeman gave him the same answer. The day after, Patrick went to the house once more
lyrics.translation: 这一次，警察给了他相同的答案。第二天，帕特里克再次去了那座房子。

lyrics.text: and asked exactly the same question. This time, the policeman lost his temper.
lyrics.translation: 然后问了完全相同的问题。这一次，警察失去了耐心。

lyrics.text: I told you yesterday and the day before yesterday, he shouted, Mr. Lane was defeated in the elections.
lyrics.translation: 我昨天和前天就告诉你了，他喊道，莱恩先生在选举中失败了。

lyrics.text: He has retired from political life and gone to live abroad.
lyrics.translation: 他已退出政治生活，移居国外。

lyrics.text: I know, answered Patrick, but I'd love to hear you say it.
lyrics.translation: 我知道，帕特里克回答说，但我很想听你说出来。
